channel.title: Software Architecture Evolution on Mircea Lungu
channel.description: Recent content in Software Architecture Evolution on Mircea Lungu

item.title: Softwarenaut
item.description: Softwarenaut is built on top of the Cincom distribution of Smalltalk for historical reasons. This means that in order to run the tool you also need Cincom Smalltalk. There are three ways in which you can install the tool.
